discourse_list.title: [Canceled] Focus On # 13: RWF Transition Plan AMA

content.content: Update: Cancelled - Personal Reasons   Focus On # 13: RWF Transition Plan AMA  For the 13th episode of Focus On … An Intro From The Fellas RWF-0x AMA Introduction - YouTube This AMA will serve as a venue for Maker token holders, the Maker community, existing core units, delegates, and the rest to ask or inquire about RWF-0x, a prospective core unit spun out by core contributors. While we are happy to address whatever attendees feel is important, we’d prefer to focus on the future rather than the past. We’d also prefer to engage on substance rather than politics. What matters for Real World Assets at MakerDAO is taking what we, as a community, have achieved thus far and parlaying it into future successes. In this session, we will host prospective RWF-0x contributors: @christiancdpetersen @teej @eumenes The team will make brief introductions of the core unit members, followed by an open floor for questions, queries, rants (from teej!), pontifications (from Eric!), and concerns! Note: Eric may not be in attendance, as he’s currently with his wife and kids on vacation. What a time to be out-of-office! Onwards.  Join us!  @juan and @retro will host.  When Time in your local-timezone format: 2022-08-10T14:30:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where Crowdcast call Attn: @Recognized-Delegates, @GovAlpha-Core-Unit, @Risk-Core-Unit, @SES-Core-Unit, @Protocol-Engineering, @Growth-Core-Unit, @Oracles-Core-Unit, @gov-comms-core-unit, @collateral-core-unit, @happiness-core-unit, @dux-core-unit, @data-insights-cu, @immunefi-core-unit, @strat-fin-core-unit
